data.title: Freiburg, Germany
data.meta_description: August weather for Freiburg, Germany: August, noted for its average high-temperature of 23.3°C (73.9°F) and an average low-temperature of 12.2°C (54°F), is considered the warmest month in Freiburg. In Freiburg, Germany, in August, during 10.3 rainfall days, 27mm (1.06") of precipitation is typically accumulated.
data.text:
Average high temperature in August: 23.3°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is August (23.3°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (3°C).

Average low temperature in August: 12.2°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (12.3°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (-2.1°C).

Average snowfall in August

Freiburg, Germany

Average snowfall in August: 0mm

The month with the highest snowfall is January (26mm).

The months with the least snowfall are May, June, July, August, September and October (0mm).

Average snowfall days in August

Freiburg, Germany

Average snowfall days in August: 0 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (4.9 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

Average daylight in August /

Average sunshine in August

Freiburg, Germany

Average daylight in August: 14h and 2min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 16h and 0min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 30min).

Average sunshine in August: 10h and 1min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 10h and 12min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 4h and 24min).

Average UV index in August

Freiburg, Germany

Average UV index in August: 4

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 5).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, October, November and December (UV index 2).

Average visibility in August

Freiburg, Germany

Average visibility in August: 9km

The months with the highest visibility are March, April, July and August (9km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, May, June, September, October, November and December (8km).
